#summary Describes status of the project
#labels Featured

= Status =

Currently, it works quite well, and there is a very basic example of use provided both in the release and with the source code.

== Plans ==

There is little in the area of error handling...for example, if one supplies a bad filename on the command line, it just crashes with a stack trace.  This will be improved to make it more friendly.

More complicated examples, including use of the `SkipXXX` elements would be nice.

The unit tests are a little flaky, in that they don't actually test anything.  It'd be nice if they did...
